price: Ми смо још пре Авраму дали разборитост и добро смо га познавали.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā ib'rāhīma rush'dahu min qablu wakunnā bihi ʿālimīna
